title: May Prepares to Trigger Brexit, Begins Countdown (Audio)
itunes:title: May Prepares to Trigger Brexit, Begins Countdown (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Catherine Barnard, a professor at the University of Cambridge School of Law, discusses the steps U.K. prime minister Theresa May will take to formally trigger the British exit from the EU. She speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
